channel.title: How do I start up a server?
channel.description:
First things first. Mods, if you can, please delete my previous topic titled "Forgot how to make a server."
OK, I received my source, got an IP, etc. everything's ready. Now, what's the instructions to start up my server? I have my No-IP running. Is it Moparscape runbot, then server runbot... or what do I do? I'm confused. Someone please tell me what to do. Thx.

item.title: How do I start up a server?
item.dc:creator: @Generalscape Generalscape
item.description:
@Generalscape wrote:

OK.Then I put in the new server: militaryscape.no-ip.org and in the new port: 43594, right? Then I start the server and I’m on?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2008, 03:51:14 PM[/size][hr]Anybody? Please, I need help.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I start up a server?

item.title: How do I start up a server?
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

you run the moparscape “runbot” then you run the server.

Read full topic
